attributes.action: Introduce Free Voting in the House of Commons on all EU matters and in general.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown refuses to allow the British people the referendum promised on the EU Reform Treaty (aka Constitution). Other MPs support his governments dishonesty by claiming that referenda have no part in a "representative democracy". 

How can the electorate's wishes be represented when the parties, and the governing party in particular, force our representatives to vote in a way determined by the party. In a truly representative democracy, there would be no party whips, and there would be free votes on this and EVERY issue.
